Actually, this is not the first time. Its far from it.

::Oblitertron::

Oblitertron roars as the fang cuts into his hand, the back of his palm 
smashing into Koj. He looks up, firing his optics at Inu-Yasha.

The huge robot jerks his hand do try and dislodge the blade. He roars again, 
firing his optic lasers, this time at Koj, careful not to hit his own hand.
